description: LPDF files can be opened in Mac OS X with Apple Preview, the built-in previewer for PDF files.
NOTE: LPDF files are not PDF files. They are a specifically-formatted Mac OS X package that contains a PDF file as well as localization information.

common_filenames.description: About Stacks.lpdf - Located in the users' Documents directory and explains how Document Stacks are used in Mac OS X.
About Downloads.lpdf - Located in the users' Downloads directory and provides information about how Mac OS X manages file downloads.
